data.label: HMS Business Touch Kit
data.description: 华为服务号（Business Touch Kit）提供给商家对应的服务号，让用户快速发现商家服务，建立用户与商家的互动连接。为您提供华为统一的商家服务号中心，通过服务分发，用户互动连接，多样化的营销工具等，促进商家的商业闭环。

data.label: HMS Business Touch Kit
data.description: Huawei Business Touch Kit provides merchants with corresponding service numbers, allowing users to quickly discover merchant services and establish interactive connections between users and merchants. It provides Huawei's unified merchant service number center, promoting merchants' business closed-loop through service distribution, user interaction connections, and diverse marketing tools.
